description: Organizations that subscribe to the best practices in the era of smart technology may be behind the times. It is far more sustainable to be concerned about next practices. In traditional management consulting, best practices was king, now the ability to leverage insights to redefine experiences and reinvent business models using data, digital and cloud technologies reign. This suite of new approach - that we refer to as Consulting 2.0 (Next Practice consulting) - represents a major change from the older approaches to apply a toolbox of methods. Focus will be placed on developing proficiencies required to practice Consulting 2.0
title: Consulting 2.0
